text: Hello everyone! I am Abhinav, the founder and CEO of Postman (<http://www.getpostman.com|www.getpostman.com>). We are expanding our design team in San Francisco and are also setting up an internal UX research lab. Since 2014, We have focused our efforts on building a powerful tool that can be used by everyone which has led to more than 7 million users using Postman to do something productive. Our users span the whole spectrum of hardcore developers to DevOps/Writers and even the C-suite. If you are interested in joining us, feel free to DM me!
